import java.util.*;

class GFG {
	public static void main (String[] args) {
		Scanner yup = new Scanner(System.in);
		int m = yup.nextInt(), n = yup.nextInt();
		int[][] a = new int[m][n];
		for(int i = 0; i < m; i++)
		    for(int j = 0; j < n; j++)
		        a[i][j] = yup.nextInt();
		
		for(int i = 0; i < m; i++)
		    Arrays.sort(a[i]);
		int s = a[0][0];
		for(int i = 1; i < m; i++)
		    if(s < a[i][0])
		        s = a[i][0];
		        
		System.out.println(s);
	}
}
